snippet: The stock offering raised $260 million and values the company, which puts on dance festivals, at $1.05 billion, a person briefed on the matter said.

byline.original: By BEN SISARIO and MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The stock offering raised $260 million and values the company, which puts on dance festivals, at $1.05 billion, a person briefed on the matter said.

headline.main: SFX Entertainment Prices Its I.P.O. at $13 a Share
